frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-replace-activities-text
frozen.shortDescription: A Simple Extension to Change 'Activities' Label with Logo and Text.
frozen.longDescription:
A Simple Extension to Change 'Activities' Label with Logo and Text.
You can Keep Either
1. Logo or
2. Text or
3. Both or
4. None at all
